content.question: During an El Niño event, farmers in the southwestern United Stated often benefit from which of the following climatic changes?

choices.label: Longer and cooler summers that increase crop yield
Wetter and warmer weather that increases soil moisture
Cooler and drier conditions that help cold-weather crops
Warmer and drier weather that reduces soil erosion and flooding

content.answer: Wetter and warmer weather that increases soil moisture
